description:
G17 Common Crab Apple x 4 
 - Reduce and reshape crowns by 20 - 25% all round, lift and clean out crown and balance, remove deadwood.
 T227 Silver Birch - Reduce crown all round by 25 - 30% and remove dieback from branch ends. Cleanout crown, lift and balance.
 T236/236 Willow x 2 - Re-pollard to main trunk knuckles
 T231/232 Deodar Cedar x 2 - Clean out crown, remove deadwood, broken and hanging branches and weak and suppressed growth.
 T265/266 Silver birch x 2 - Reduce in height by 25 - 30%, clean out crown, remove deadwood and balance Hedge behind T267 - not protected by TPO
 T259 Elder - Pollard at 2.5m height
 Cotoneaster  adjacent T259 reduce and reshape
 T254 Tibetan Cherry - Reduce down to new shoots on main trunks.
 T253 Common Crab Apple very poor condition - Fell, grind stump
 T252 Ash - Remove deadwood and tighten brace.
 T277 Oak - Reduce and reshape, pruning back to live growth.
 T288 Unknown species 
 - Reduce and reshape lateral crown spread all round by 30 - 35% Thin and clean out crown  remove deadwood weak and suppressed branches, lift canopy by 1 - 2m all round and balance Elm etc in car park - prune back to boundary
 T275 Horse Chestnut dying Fell to ground level, treat stump
 T279 Lime - Remove deadwood, clean out crown, remove basal suckers.
 T293 Cherry - Clean out crown remove deadwood
 T291 Common Crab Apple dying -  fell and grind stump Cherry dying - fell and remove root
 T286 False Acacia - clean out crown remove deadwood.
 Shrub  border outside 11 - fell and grub out all conifers 
 T242 Pear - Reduce lateral crown all round by 25 - 30%, clean out crown, remove Dead wood lift and balance crown
 T258  Horse Chestnut - reduce crown all round by 25 - 30% to previous reduction points, clean out crown lift & balance
 T252 Ash -  Horse Chestnut - reduce crown all round by 25 - 30% to previous reduction points, clean out crown lift & balance T318 Horse Chestnut - reduce and thin by 25 - 30% 
 Adjacent T252 - Cypress - fell, grind down stump
